summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content: Full-Stack Developer with 10 years of experience delivering web and mobile solutions. Proficient in Laravel and React, with a comprehensive skill set that includes CSS, SQL Databases, Node, and Vue 2+, among other technologies.

details.description: Created a web app for managing income, expenses, customers, contracts, payroll, and a board that streamlined the process of purchasing materials, tools, and office supplies of medium-sized companies using Laravel 10, React 18, and ChartJS, and added some automated tests using Cypress.
Developed a website for a building company and its administrative panel using Laravel 11 and React 18.
Created a web app to manage employees and generate documents that they request using Laravel 11 and React 19.

Added some processes to a web application on the frontend for managing documentation, including creation, modification, review, and navigation of documents changes using Vue 2, Apollo, TypeScript, Nuxt, and Graphql, Storybook and Cypress.
Created and extended websites adding some pages, search and navigation features built with October CMS version 2 and 3.
Developed an October CMS plugin to manage newsletters for one website.

Updated a website and a web application to manage events between sellers and buyers that a company organizes, allowing seller registration and notifications, using Laravel 8, React, Tailwind and Inertia.
Developed a web application to manage sales processes, visualized on a board and a chat for the communication of the players using React, Azure Chat, Redux, and GO.js deployed on Azure.
Added features to an e-learning platform using React, Next and Redux Saga.
Added views to mobile apps using React Native and Styled Components.
Created a web application to manage civil works progress and documentation, including sketch creation and photo organization using Laravel 6, Vue 2 and Vuetify.
Created an Android app to track work progress and maintain photographic record, integrated into documentation generation using React Native.

Provided support and updates to several projects that belonged to a company that offers tools and material to schools using Laravel version 5.3 and 5.4, JQuery, Dio, and React, deployed on Elastic Beanstalk instances.
Added features to recognize objects in images and videos using AWS Rekognition and translate them to other languages using AWS Translate.
Created a chatbot to practice multiplication tables using Botpress, additional chatbots were created using NodeJS and Dialogflow
Created and updated websites using WordPress, CSS, and Bootstrap for medium and big companies.
Added some features to several web applications created in mainly Laravel and other frameworks and languages.
Created a web application for training company to manage customers, trainers, courses, payments, and reports; using Laravel 5.5, VueJs 2, Vuetify, Snappy PDF, and Maatwebsite Excel.
Developed search tools, mailing modules, and other features for web applications built with .Net, C#.
Optimized several queries in SQL Server to enhance performance
Added billing modules and other features in a Windows Desktop application for a company that sells beauty products with several branches, and put it into production.
Provided client support and resolved issues with the application.

Developed a web application to manage business information, including CRUDs of employees, clients, providers, and inventory; also modules for managing salaries and loans, requests for vehicles and tools, expense justifications; works location on Google Maps and monitoring; using Laravel 5.2 and VueJS 2+.
Created a web app to estimate costs of works and generate the respective documentation.

Developed an Android application to manage and collect data about field work, take pictures with location information, and synchronization with the server, payments, and authorization notifications of purchases using Java and Android Studio.
Built the company's website using PHP and Sass.
Modified a web application created with CodeIgniter that was used to print construction plans based on saved measurements.
